title: Old Video Resurfaces, Claims to Show Saudi Mall Post Lockdown
subtitle: Saudi Arabia Mall Viral Video Fact Check: The Quint could trace back the video to 2019 when some social media users had claimed that the video shows gathering in a store in Al-Shawqiyah after it announced discounts.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A viral video showing several people entering a store as the doors open is being shared with the claim that it shows a shopping mall in Saudi Arabia “after lifting of lockdown.”

However, The Quint could trace back the video to 2019 when some social media users had claimed that the video shows gathering in a store in Al-Shawqiyah, near Mecca, after it announced discounts.
